byline.original: By WINNIE HU and KATE PASTOR

abstract: Two Rikers Island correction officers and a cook at facility are indicted for accepting bribes from inmates to smuggle in contraband; indictments are part of months-long investigation into three smuggling operations at Rikers that began after arrest of Corrections Officer Kevin McKoy in 2015; 17 people have been indicted to date.
lead_paragraph: The city employees were indicted after a monthslong investigation into three smuggling operations that took place at the Rikers Island jail complex.

headline.main: Rikers Island Guards and a Cook Took Bribes, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Rikers Cook and Guards Took Bribes, Officials Looking Into Smuggling Say

snippet: The city employees were indicted after a monthslong investigation into three smuggling operations that took place at the Rikers Island jail complex.
